July 2, 1910 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
La Traviata [unknown arranger]
Ynys Recreation Ground, Aberdare, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £12 and shield, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. 7 bands competed.
May 31, 2018, 10:15 p.m. May 31, 2018, 10:21 p.m.
